name: root
description: A monorepo of Vue and JS packages for Cosmos SDK apps
author: Tendermint, Inc <hello@tendermint.com>

scripts.netlify:client: cd ./packages/client-js && npm install && npm run build && npm link
scripts.netlify:vue: cd ./packages/vue && npm install && npm run build && npm link
scripts.netlify:vuex: cd ./packages/vuex && npm install && npm link @starport/client-js && npm run build && npm link
scripts.netlify:template: cd ./packages/template && npm install && npm link @starport/vue @starport/vuex && npm run build
scripts.netlify:build: npm run netlify:client && npm run netlify:vue && npm run netlify:vuex && npm run netlify:template
